narrative: Created comprehensive conceptual ledgers for Intent-Driven Trading SpecLang integration between JGTML and jgtagentic. The ledgers bridge trader narrative analysis into executable .jgtml-spec files through LLM translation frameworks, technical signal mapping, and recursive learning systems. Established translation patterns for Elliott Wave analysis, multi-timeframe confluence, and market structure analysis with complete JGTML signal integration.

recursive_agency.pattern_crystallization: Successful signal execution → memory storage → template evolution
recursive_agency.adaptive_learning: Performance feedback → specification refinement → improved translation
recursive_agency.knowledge_evolution: Trader language patterns → signal mapping database → enhanced prompts

implementation_roadmap.phase_1: Enhanced IntentSpecParser with JGTML signal mapping
implementation_roadmap.phase_2: Elliott Wave pattern templates and multi-timeframe confluence logic
implementation_roadmap.phase_3: Trading Echo Lattice integration for adaptive learning
